about_the_game:
Overview

Turn-based roguelike with terraforming, where players battle with The Mist: A malevolent mysterious entity enshrouding the world. As a Mist Forged, you wield the mystical abilities to summon the earth and control the weather, battling against the encroaching void and its fearsome denizens. With each run, explore a procedurally generated landscape, rebuild the world, and uncover the secrets hidden within The Mist.

Key Features

  • Fight The Mist: "Fog of War" personified, The Mist is an ever present enemy that player's must learn to overcome.
  • Rebuild the World: Explore and discover unique locations, bringing them into your network of structures. Strengthen your home village and improve the resilience of your people.
  • Terraforming Abilities: Use your magic to reshape the land, raise new earth, and manipulate biomes to your advantage. Synergize the terrain with your skills and strategically overcome enemies in combat.
  • Dynamic World: Experience a constantly changing environment where mountains rise, chasms open, and the very ground beneath you shifts.
  • Strategic Gameplay: Plan your moves carefully as the terrain affects buffs, debuffs, and other effects on characters and enemies.
  • Progression System: Gain experience, improve your character, unlock new abilities, and find new synergies.
  • Meta Progression: After each run, return home to work on your village. Discover new people, build new structures, and improve your odds of survival.
  • Deep Story: Uncover the secrets of The Mist, learn what it's like to live in this world, and find out what went wrong.
  • Immersive Aesthetic: Enjoy a unique blend of low-poly art and high-fidelity lighting, with a misty ambiance and tabletop aesthetics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
